content: प्रहृष् {c4c} <ab>P.</ab> {@--1@} To be glad, to rejoice; न प्रहृष्येत् प्रियं प्राप्य <ls>Bg. 5. 20</ls>; <ls n="Bg.">11. 36.</ls> {@--2@} To stand on end, bristle (as hair of the body). {@--3@} To rejoice before hand, anticipate pleasure. {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} To gladden, exhilarate, delight.
